org.jretty.util

类 IOUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jretty.util.IOUtils

  • public class IOUtils
extends Object
    IO utils best practice {高效的IO工具类}
    从以下版本开始:
    2013-6-15
    作者:
    zollty

    • 方法详细资料

      • getBufferedWriter

        public static BufferedWriter getBufferedWriter(String fileFullPath,
                                               boolean append,
                                               String charSet)
                                        throws IOException
        get BufferedWriter output stream
        参数:
        fileFullPath - the absolute file path
        append - true if can append
        charSet - assign charSet,null if use the default charSet
        返回:
        BufferedWriter
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getBufferedReader

        public static final BufferedReader getBufferedReader(String fileFullPath,
                                                     String charSet)
                                              throws IOException
        get BufferedReader input stream
        参数:
        fileFullPath - the absolute file path
        charSet - assign charSet,null if use the default charSet
        返回:
        BufferedReader
        抛出:
        IOException

      • getInputStreamFromString

        public static final InputStream getInputStreamFromString(String str,
                                                         String charSet)
        将字符串转换为 InputStream 输入流
        参数:
        charSet - 指定字符编码

      • getReaderFromString

        public static final Reader getReaderFromString(String str)
        将字符串转换为 Reader 输入流

      • copyToString

        public static String copyToString(Reader in)
                           throws IOException
        Copy the contents of the given Reader into a String. Closes the reader when done.
        参数:
        in - the reader to copy from
        返回:
        the String that has been copied to
        抛出:
        IOException - in case of I/O errors

      • clone

        public static final int clone(InputStream in,
                              OutputStream out)
                       throws IOException
        抛出:
        IOException
        另请参阅:
        clone(InputStream, long, OutputStream)

      • clone

        public static int clone(Reader in,
                        Writer out)
                 throws IOException
        Copy the contents of the given Reader to the given Writer. Closes both when done.
        参数:
        in - the Reader to copy from
        out - the Writer to copy to
        返回:
        the number of characters copied
        抛出:
        IOException - in case of I/O errors

      • clone

        public static final int clone(InputStream in,
                              long len,
                              OutputStream out)
                       throws IOException
        参数:
        len - in-source-length e.g. long len = fileIn.length()
        抛出:
        IOException

      • cloneWithoutClose

        public static final int cloneWithoutClose(InputStream in,
                                          long len,
                                          OutputStream out)
                                   throws IOException
        参数:
        len - in-source-length e.g. long len = fileIn.length()
        抛出:
        IOException

      • closeIO

        public static final void closeIO(OutputStream out)
        静默关闭输出流
